Name: DUSTNET
About the game: DUSTNET is an asymmetrical experience, join as a PC , VR , or AR player, enter the ruins of de_dust2 and rebuild. PLAY IN AUGMENTED REALITY FOR FREE Visit the DUSTNET website to download the mobile AR companion app. Features Play as a COMPUTER, VIRTUAL REALITY, or AUGMENTED REALITY player and join DUSTNET, each platform is its own unique player type in this experimental multiplayer server. Explore the ruins of DUSTNET, unlock bhop, noclip, teleport, and other admin commands. Join with your friends in VR & AR to edit the map and server, choose to be a competitive or cooperative player.
